General.Loading: Waiting for response from the jungle...

Home.Title: Welcome to Mapinguari!
Home.Subtitle: Play online with your friends! ({{minPlayers}}-{{maxPlayers}} players)

Toast.LeftError: Unfortunately {{name}} could not leave the room because of a error!
Toast.SelectCardFailed: Card could not be selected! Please try again!
Toast.MeetingEnabled: The meeting has been activated. Take part in it!

GameStarted.MessageGood: The game has been started. As a defender of good, your goal is to uncover all the blue cards! Talk about your card deck and then: Happy Hunting!
GameStarted.MessageBad: The game has been started. As a defender of evil, your goal is to uncover all the blue cards! Talk about your card deck and then: Happy Hunting!

Player.Title: Players
Player.RejoinAlert: Send {{names}} the code {{roomCode}} or link {{link}} so he can join again.
Player.KickMessage: Do you really want to kick {{name}}?

Stop.Message: Do you really want to end the game?

Meeting.Title: Meeting
Meeting.Description: Your game admin wants to start a meeting! Click the button to join!

Join.Subheader: Select avatar, insert your name and hit Start now
Join.Name: Insert name
Join.Error: The game is already in progress or the name is already taken! Contact the game admin for more information.
Join.Not Exist Text: The room does not exist anymore

Lobby.Waiting: We are just waiting for new players to join and the admin to start the game!
Lobby.Join: To allow other players to join, provide them with the following link or code:
Lobby.CopyFailed: We could not copy anything to your clipboard!
Lobby.StartPlayerDisconnected: The game can not be started until all players are connected. Wait for {{names}} or kick them to start the game!
Lobby.StartWrongPlayerCount: The game can only be played with {{minPlayers}} to {{maxPlayers}} players! Please check the number of players!

Table.NotYourTurn: It's not your turn yet. Wait until it' s your time!
Table.DontClickOnYourself: You can't choose your own card! Instead, simply choose a card from your fellow players!
Table.CardAlreadyVisible: The card has already been exposed! Choose another one!
Table.CardsAll: Cards drawn and cards in the game per type

Imprint.Title: Imprint
Imprint.PostText: Please contact me only with justified interest!

Error.Title: Error 404
Error.Text: If you were looking for a Mapinguari - here it is not!
